Sechaba Brewery Holdings Limited bụ ụlọ ọrụ na-ejide ego na pasenti iri isii na-achịkwa mmasị na Kgalagadi Breweries Limited (KBL) na Botswana Breweries (Pty) Limited. SAB Miller nwere pasenti iri anọ fọdụrụnụ.
E depụtara ya na Botswana Stock exchange na 19 Jun 1989.
Ndị isi na-ekere òkè na SBHL bụ:
